segments.text: I am looking at a kitchen scene, a line drawing in front of me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an adult woman, quite oblivious, drying a plate at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink, mind you, is overflowing with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just pouring over the edge, creating a large puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is actually standing right in this growing pool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an incredible waste of water, just running constantly from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors below are getting soaked, too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the water glistening as it streams down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She holds a dish towel, her focus entirely on that single plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a strangely calm scene despite the impending flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she will ever notice the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
